body.name: Corsair VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 RAM 32GB (2x16GB) 3200MHz CL16 Intel XMP 2.0 Computer Memory - Black (CMK32GX4M2E3200C16)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 29 mins
features: Hand-sorted memory chips ensure high performance with generous overclocking headroom
VENGEANCE LPX is optimized for wide compatibility with the latest Intel and AMD DDR4 motherboards
A low-profile height of just 34mm ensures that VENGEANCE LPX even fits in most small-form-factor builds
A solid aluminum heatspreader efficiently dissipates heat from each module so that they consistently run at high clock speeds
Supports Intel XMP 2.0 for simple one-setting installation and setup
Available in multiple colors to match the style of your system

Overclocking overhead is limited by operating temperature. The unique design of the VENGEANCE LPX heat spreader optimally pulls heat away from the ICs and into your system’s cooling path, so you can push it harder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unleashing the Beast: A Memory Module that Packs a Punch!
reviews.reviewText: As an avid gamer and computer enthusiast, I am always on the lookout for components that can take my rig to the next level. Recently, I decided to upgrade my RAM, and after extensive research, I settled on the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 kit. Let me tell you, this memory module is an absolute beast!First things first, the installation process was a breeze. The modules fit perfectly into my motherboard slots, and the black heat spreaders added a touch of elegance to my setup. It's worth mentioning that Corsair's attention to detail and build quality are second to none.Once I fired up my system, the difference was immediately noticeable. The Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 breathed new life into my PC, enhancing its overall performance and responsiveness. Games that used to stutter and lag now ran seamlessly, and multitasking became a breeze. The 3200MHz clock speed provided lightning-fast data transfer, and the low latency ensured smooth operations even during the most demanding tasks.What impressed me the most was the module's stability. I pushed my system to its limits, running resource-intensive applications, and the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 handled it like a champ. No crashes, no hiccups, just pure reliability.On top of its outstanding performance, this memory module also impressed me with its overclocking capabilities. I managed to push it beyond the advertised clock speed, and it remained stable without any issues. Corsair's DDR4 modules are known for their overclocking prowess, and this one certainly lives up to the reputation.Lastly, let's talk about value for money. The Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 may not be the cheapest option out there, but it's worth every penny. The performance boost it provides is unmatched, and the peace of mind that comes with Corsair's excellent customer support is priceless.If there's one thing I must mention, it's the personal experience I had with the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4. During an intense gaming session, my computer froze, and I was convinced it was a hardware issue. However, after some troubleshooting, I discovered that one of the memory modules wasn't seated properly. I reinstalled it correctly, and my system was up and running smoothly again. This incident made me appreciate the module's reliability even more.Now, let's dive into the humor aspect of my experience. Picture this: I'm engrossed in a thrilling gaming session, completely immersed in the virtual world. Suddenly, my character freezes mid-action, and I can almost hear the virtual enemies laughing at my plight. Frustrated, I check my system specs, only to find out that my old RAM couldn't handle the intense gameplay. Enter the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4. With a swift installation, I was back in the game, slaying enemies and leaving them in virtual awe.But it wasn't just gaming that benefited from this memory upgrade. Everyday tasks like photo editing and video rendering became significantly faster. I could breeze through complex edits without the dreaded loading screens, and my productivity skyrocketed. The Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 truly transformed my computer into a powerhouse.I can't help but recall a funny incident that happened after upgrading to the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 memory. As a self-proclaimed computer nerd, I enjoy showing off my rig to my friends. So, I invited them over for a gaming night to experience the power of my newly upgraded system.As we gathered around the computer, I boasted about the lightning-fast speed and seamless multitasking capabilities of my PC, all thanks to the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4. Eager to demonstrate, I launched a resource-intensive game and started a video render simultaneously, expecting my system to handle it like a breeze.To my horror, the game froze, and the render came to a screeching halt. My friends erupted into laughter, jokingly calling it the "ultimate multitasking fail." In that moment, I couldn't help but join in on the laughter. It was a humbling reminder that even with top-notch components, there are limits to what our systems can handle.However, what impressed us all was how quickly my PC recovered from the hiccup. Within seconds, the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 kicked back into action, effortlessly resuming the game and rendering process without skipping a beat. We were all left amazed at the module's resilience and ability to handle demanding tasks even after a momentary blip.This incident only further cemented my confidence in the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4. It not only delivers exceptional performance but also has a sense of humor, reminding us that technology can have its quirks. It's these unexpected moments that make the journey with this memory kit all the more enjoyable.In conclusion, the Corsair Vengeance LPX 32GB DDR4 is an absolute game-changer. Its easy installation, exceptional performance, stability, overclocking capabilities, and overall value make it a must-have for any serious PC enthusiast. Whether you're a gamer or a content creator, this memory kit will take your computing experience to new heights. Don't hesitate, unleash the beast and upgrade your system today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yep, It's RAM, and It Gets the Job Done
reviews.reviewText: The Corsair VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 RAM 32GB kit is a solid choice for anyone looking to upgrade their system's memory.Reliable Performance:This RAM kit does exactly what RAM is supposed to do - it provides reliable and fast memory performance. With 32GB of memory and a 3600MHz speed, it's perfect for handling multitasking and demanding applications.Easy Installation:Installing this RAM was a breeze. The design and build quality are top-notch, and it fit perfectly into my motherboard without any issues.Boosted Gaming and Performance:With this upgraded RAM, my system's overall performance has noticeably improved. Gaming sessions are smoother, and multitasking feels much more fluid.Corsair Quality Assurance:Corsair is known for producing quality computer components, and this RAM kit lives up to their reputation. It feels sturdy and dependable, giving me confidence in its long-term performance.Heat Spreader Design:The VENGEANCE LPX comes with a sleek heat spreader design that not only looks cool but also helps keep the RAM cool during heavy usage.Great Deal for the Price:Considering the performance and brand reputation, this RAM kit offers a great deal for its price. It competes well with higher-priced options without breaking the bank.Ideal for Gaming and Content Creation:If you're a gamer or content creator, this 32GB kit is an excellent investment. It provides the extra memory needed to handle resource-intensive tasks without any hiccups.Final Verdict:In conclusion, the Corsair VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 RAM 32GB (2x16GB) 3600MHz delivers solid performance and gets the job done without any fuss. If you're looking for reliable and fast RAM to boost your system's performance, this kit is a great choice. It's a dependable option for both gamers and content creators alike. When it comes to value for money, the Corsair VENGEANCE LPX DDR4 RAM 32GB kit is a winner, offering a great deal for its impressive performance. I'm pleased with my purchase, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of an RAM upgrade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB (2x8GB) DDR4 DRAM 3200MHz C16 (CMK16GX4M2B3200C16) memory kit is a great option for those looking for reliable and efficient performance in their desktop system. With a total capacity of 16GB distributed across two modules of 8GB each, this kit offers an optimal balance between capacity and speed.The 3200MHz clock speed and CAS 16 latency ensure fast and agile performance, ideal for both mainstream users and gaming and computing enthusiasts. Corsair's Vengeance LPX series is designed to deliver high-end performance and exceptional stability, backed by the brand's reputation for manufacturing quality components.Additionally, the low-profile heat sink design not only helps maintain optimal temperatures, but also allows for easy integration into space-constrained systems. Support for XMP 2.0 overclocking profiles makes it easy to optimize performance with a simple adjustment in the BIOS settings.The Corsair Vengeance LPX 16GB DDR4 3200MHz C16 is a solid choice for those looking for reliable performance, adequate capacity, and Corsair's renowned quality in desktop RAM.
Solid deal for the price. No issues so far after 2 weeks of using it.
Smooth installation and running. Zero issues, very happy.
